alert.note: Alert for Barnstable; Eastern Essex; Eastern Norfolk; Eastern Plymouth; Nantucket; Suffolk (Massachusetts) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Coastal Flood Statement issued June 14 at 3:17PM EDT until June 15 at 3:00AM EDT by NWS Boston
info.description: ...COASTAL FLOOD STATEMENT IN EFFECT FROM 11 PM THIS EVENING TO 3 AM EDT WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Up to one half foot of inundation above ground level expected in low-lying areas near shorelines and tidal waterways (2.6 to 12.9 feet Mean Lower Low Water). * WHERE...Eastern Essex MA, Suffolk MA, Eastern Norfolk MA, Eastern Plymouth MA, Barnstable MA and Nantucket MA Counties. * WHEN...From 11 PM this evening to 3 AM EDT Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Minor coastal flooding is expected along the North Shore from Gloucester to Newburyport. High astronomical high tides and weak onshore flow will likely cause some washover onto coastal roads around the time of high tide. && Time of high total tides are approximate to the nearest hour.
